üìÇ¬†Reference ‚Üí Airnode ‚Üí v1.0  Cloud Resources [#] (#frontmatter-title)  ===========================================================================================  When deployed to a cloud provider, such as AWS or GCP, Airnode uses certain resources to fully operate. @tab:AWS ResourceDescription EventBridge Timer starting the Airnode service. CloudWatch Log groups for deployed resources. Lambda The heart of the Airnode. Serverless functions providing the Airnode service. IAM Roles & policies to allow communication among other resources. API Gateway Endpoints for the HTTP Gateway and HTTP Signed Data Gateway. S3 File describing the state of the deployed infrastructure. @tab:GCP ResourceDescription Cloud Scheduler Timer starting the Airnode service. Cloud Functions The heart of the Airnode. Serverless functions providing the Airnode service. API Gateway Endpoints for the HTTP Gateway and HTTP Signed Data Gateway. Cloud Storage File describing the state of the deployed infrastructure & source code for cloud functions. IAM Service accounts & roles to allow communication among other resources.
